s.text: While it is true that all dogs go to heaven, there is a bowl curve when it comes to dog abilities and personalities.
Strong genetic differences among dog breeds are not just the result of natural selection.
Since then, groups like the Animal Legal Defense Fund--does the name sound familiar?
And, basset people, like me, want dogs that have the good sense not to do any of those things.
Unlike, say, a German shepherd, pit bulls were not bred to protect humans but to kill other dogs.
Hardest hit by this development were dachshund and Chihuahua breeders, whose product is often sold to kids--and without warning labels of any kind.
